resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74651</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74651</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>fc3de7f7-0a99-4d41-bb13-ec4e70b20a4f#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">MÜRON: A Diszkoszvető</string>
            <string language="en">Myron - The Discus Thrower</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Myron - Der Discus-Spritzring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Myron - Le Lanceur de disque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Myron - O Atirador De Disco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Myron - Il Lanciatore Di Discus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Myron - thrower Discus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Myron - El Lanzador de disco</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A diszkoszvetőben MÜRON egy befejezett és egy kezdő mozdulat holtpontját ragadta meg (Ez a különleges testtartás teszi elevenné ezt a lenyűgözően szép ókori bronzszobrot)</string>
            <string language="en">Myron captivated, in the Discus Thrower, the standstill of a finished and a beginning movements. (This special bearing makes this fascinating, beautiful ancient brass-sculpture alive.)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">müron diszkosz,  </string>
            <string language="en">myron discus</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Myron faszinierte, im Discus-Spritzring, den 
Stillstand von beendet und anfangenbewegungen. (dieses spezielle
Lager bildet diese faszinierende, schöne alte lebendige 
Messing-Skulptur.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Myron a captivé, dans le Lanceur de disque, l'arrêt 
d'un terminé et les mouvements commençants. (ce roulement 
spécial fait cette laiton-sculpture antique fascinante et belle 
vivante.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Myron captivated, no atirador de disco, a 
paralisação de um terminado e movimentos de começo. (este 
rolamento especial faz este bronze-brass-sculpture antigo fascinante, 
bonito vivo.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Myron captivated, nel lanciatore di discus, la 
fermata di una rifinita di e movimenti d'inizio. (questo 
cuscinetto speciale fa questa ottone-scultura antica affascinante e 
bella viva.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Myron εγοήτευσε, thrower Discus, το 
σταμάτημα τελειωμένη και των μετακινήσεων μιας αρχής. (Αυτό
το ειδικό ρουλεμάν κάνει αυτό το συναρπαστικό, όμορφο αρχαίο 
ορείχαλκος-γλυπτό ζωντανό.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Myron captivated, en el lanzador de disco, la 
parada de un haber acabado y los movimientos que comenzaban. 
(este cojinete especial hace esta lato'n-escultura antigua de 
fascinación, hermosa viva.)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">myron Discus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">disque de myron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">disco do myron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">discus del myron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">myron discus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">disco del myron</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>856</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74651</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=fc3de7f7-0a99-4d41-bb13-ec4e70b20a4f&v=1&b=4</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
